headers.value: Join a 15 person team of experienced high school computer science students, get coached by an engineer from Blizzard, and build your own video game to win the end of season competition.
Join a 15 person team of experienced high school computer science students, get coached by an engineer from Atlassian, and build creative and artistic software to win the end of season competition.
Join a 15 person team of experienced high school computer science students, get coached by a former Amazon engineer, and build advanced AI systems to win the end of season competition.
Natural Language Processing Team | Pike Teams
Join a 15 person team of experienced high school computer science students, get coached by a Google engineer, and build advanced language AI systems to win the end of season competition.
